title: Stainless steel appliances, Wood plank flooring, Sundeck
posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to Currents On The Charles
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1108 Sq.
Ft.
Immerse yourself in the lifestyle at Currents on the Charles.
This riverside community with well-appointed apartments and luxurious amenities sets a new standard in luxury living.
Take advantage of private courtyards with resort-style pool and sundeck, controlled-access private garage, fitness center, and Resident lounge complete with a community library.
These Waltham apartments feature wood plank flooring, high ceilings, full-sized washer and dryer, and a gourmet kitchen complete with premium cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.
Located on the bank of the Charles River, Currents on the Charles boasts an ideal location with easy access to the scenic waterfront as well as I-95 and the Mass Pike.
Visit Currents today for a personalized tour of our remarkable apartment community.
We are currently offering self-guided tours.
